      class  ByteArraySymCiphertext
      This class represents the most basic symmetric ciphertext.

      This class is a container for cipher-texts that include actual encrypted data and the resulting tag.
      class  IVCiphertext
      This class is a container for cipher-texts that include actual cipher data and the IV used.

      SymmetricCiphertext SymMultiplicativeHomomorphicEnc.multiply(SymmetricCiphertext c1, SymmetricCiphertext c2)
      Given two ciphers c1 = enc(p1), c2 = enc(p2) this function returns c1 * c2 = enc(p1 * p2)

      Given two ciphers c1 = enc(p1), c2 = enc(p2) this function returns c1 * c2 = enc(p1 * p2)
